snippet: John le Carré recently answered a critic who said the real-life inspiration for the fictional spy George Smiley deplored Mr. le Carré’s view of the intelligence services.
abstract: John le Carré recently answered a critic who said the real-life inspiration for the fictional spy George Smiley deplored Mr. le Carré’s view of the intelligence services.

headline.main: What the Real George Smiley Thought
